sect2.title: Image Metadata
sect2.para: This command allows you to view EXIF, XMP and IPTC metadata embedded in JPG, JPEG2000, PNG, TIFF and PSD images. Besides, when exporting to TIFF, PNG and JPEG, you can choose which kind of metadata you want to preserve.

sect3.title: Activating the Command
sect3.para:
You can access this command from the image menubar through
Image Image Metadata .
